response.original_title: Every Time You Your Mind: A Film About Failure
response.overview: A documentary film about the Los Angeles alternative rock band Failure. The film explores the band's origins, their rise and fall in the 90s, and their eventual reunion and continued work. It delves into the themes of drug addiction, record company issues, and the band's enduring impact on their peers and subsequent generations of musicians.
response.title: Every Time You Your Mind: A Film About Failure
